views.markdown:
iOS 12 and 13 support Added iOS 11 and 12 support

Compatibility with older versions is still maintained Added support for iOS 10.

iOS 8 and 9 are still supported.
Added 3D Touch shortcut support Fixed the recently introduced compatibility issues with iOS 8

Added the keyboard on app launch and resume feature for iOS 9 Initial iOS 9 support Fixes a bug where TypeTab would stop working if you have no favorites in Safari.

Deleting the last open tab now invokes TypeTab
Added Canopy support
Improved stability
1.2 Fixed an issue with the tab overview add tab button

1.1 Type on entering foreground
You can now type into the search field immediately after you open safari and when it enters the foreground!
